column4: Click in virtualpc on the desktop of your ubuntu, and press simultanisly ctrl alt +    or ctrl alt -   this will cahnge the resolution, maybe this helps...
If youre in Gnome now, choose menu System, than prferences, then resolution. There you can set the resolution.
Press alt F1 to get the menu, than use cursorkeys...
Use VirtualBox, its also for windows, and its free, and fast.. There's also an OpenSource version of Virtualbox for ubuntu/linux, whith good support on irc-channels
